thread.title: DanielJBird commented Leicestershire Rich List 2016: 50 wealthiest people in county...
thread.title_full: DanielJBird commented Leicestershire Rich List 2016: 50 wealthiest people in county...

author: DanielJBird
title: DanielJBird commented Leicestershire Rich List 2016: 50 wealthiest people in county...
text:
Comments (1) 
The wealthiest 50 people in the county have been revealed in our 2016 Rich List. 
Ian Strachan, author of the 2016 list, examined how the wealthiest people made their fortune and contribute to the local economy. 
Writing in the Rich List supplement, Ian said: "The entrepreneurship and drive of Leicestershire people and the hard work and determination to succeed of those who have chosen to make our county their home have combined to ensure that the money keeps rolling in for the wealthiest individuals and families in the eagerly-awaited 2016 Leicestershire and Rutland Rich List. 
"Property, retail, construction, telecommunications, sport or music are all capable of propelling sons and daughters of Leicestershire into our league table of the super-rich. 
"But many on this year's list weren't born here, or indeed in the UK. 
"They came here from far away to make their fortunes, often under enormous duress and hardship. 
"While the politicians continue to argue about what Brexit means for immigration, our Rich List demonstrates in the starkest terms the contribution made to the wealth of the county by people who have chosen to make Leicestershire their home." 
In reverse order, here are Leicestershire's 50 richest people:
